abilities.name: Press the Attack
abilities.rule: Weapons equipped by models in this model’s unit have the [**SUSTAINED HITS 1]** ability.

abilities.name: Honour of the Chapter
abilities.rule: If this model is destroyed by a melee attack, if it has not fought this phase, roll one D6: on a 2+, do not remove it from play. This model can fight after the attacking unit has finished making its attacks, and is then removed from play.
